classFeature.name: No Equipment
entries: From 1st level, the sidekick has no ability to wear any equipment beyond their starting items. In exchange, they receive bonuses to their stats based on the AB/AC, Max HP, and Damage bonus columns of the Sidekick table.

classFeature.name: Passive Regeneration (prof)
entries: Also from 1st level, the sidekick heals a number of hit points equal to their proficiency bonus at the start of each of their turns in combat.

classFeature.name: Danger Sense
entries: Beginning at 2nd level, the sidekick has advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects they can see, such as traps and spells.

classFeature.name: Improved Critical (+1)
entries: Starting at 3rd level, the sidekick's critical hit range increases by 1.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 4th level, the sidekick increases one ability score of their choice by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores of their choice by 1 each. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 6th level, the sidekick increases one ability score of their choice by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores of their choice by 1 each. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 8th level, the sidekick increases one ability score of their choice by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores of their choice by 1 each. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: At 12th level, the sidekick increases one ability score of their choice by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores of their choice by 1 each. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement

classFeature.name: Extra Attack (1 extra)
entries: Beginning at 5th level, the sidekick can attack twice, instead of once, whenever they takes the Attack action on their turn.

classFeature.name: Battle Readiness
entries: After the sidekick reaches 7th level, it has advantage on initiative rolls.

classFeature.name: Improved Saves (+1)
entries: From 9th level, the sidekick gains a +1 bonus to saving throws.

classFeature.name: Improved Defence
entries: At 10th level, the sidekick's Armour Class increases by 1.

classFeature.name: Extra Attack (2 extra)
entries: Beginning at 11th level, the sidekick can attack three times, instead of once, whenever they takes the Attack action on their turn.

classFeature.name: Improved Saves (+2)
entries: From 13th level, the sidekick gains a further +1 bonus (for a total of +2) to saving throws.

classFeature.name: Improved Critical (+2)
entries: Starting at 15th level, the sidekick's critical hit range increases by a further 1 (for a total of +2).

classFeature.name: Improved Saves (+3)
entries: From 17th level, the sidekick gains a further +1 bonus (for a total of +3) to saving throws.

classFeature.name: Passive Regeneration (double prof)
entries: From 18th level, the number of hit points the sidekick heals at the start of each of their turns in combat increases to double their proficiency bonus.

classFeature.name: Extra Attack (3 extra)
entries: At 20th level, the sidekick can attack four times, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.
